mn23:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn23:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo andhavane viharati.
mn23:3.4: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ andhavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā kumārakassapo tenupasaṅkami;
mn23:3.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ etadavoca:
mn23:4.1: “Bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṃ vammiko rattiṃ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:4.4: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa laṅgiṃ ‘laṅgī, bhadante’ti.
mn23:4.8: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa uddhumāyikaṃ.
mn23:4.13: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa dvidhāpathaṃ.
mn23:4.18: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa caṅgavāraṃ.
mn23:4.23: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa kummaṃ.
mn23:4.28: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa asisūnaṃ.
mn23:4.33: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa maṃsapesiṃ.
mn23:4.38: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṃ ādāya addasa nāgaṃ.
mn23:5.1: Ime kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, pañhe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi, yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāsi.
mn23:5.2: Nāhaṃ taṃ, bhikkhu, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo imesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ ārādheyya aññatra tathāgatena vā, tathāgatasāvakena vā, ito vā pana sutvā”ti—
mn23:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā kumārakassapo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn23:6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn23:6.4: “imaṃ, bhante, rattiṃ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ andhavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn23:6.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, bhante, sā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
mn23:6.7: ‘bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṃ vammiko rattiṃ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
mn23:6.15: Ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, kā rattiṃ dhūmāyanā, kā divā pajjalanā, ko brāhmaṇo, ko sumedho, kiṃ satthaṃ, kiṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ, kā laṅgī, kā uddhumāyikā, ko dvidhāpatho, kiṃ caṅgavāraṃ, ko kummo, kā asisūnā, kā maṃsapesi, ko nāgo”ti?
mn23:7.1: “‘Vammiko’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṃ, mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassa. (1)
mn23:8.1: Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, divā kammante ārabbha rattiṃ anuvitakketi anuvicāreti—
mn23:8.3: Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, rattiṃ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti kāyena vācāya ‘manasā’—
mn23:9.1: ‘Brāhmaṇo’ti kho, bhikkhu, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
mn23:11.3: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (8)
mn23:12.3: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (9)
mn23:13.3: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (10)
mn23:14.1: ‘Caṅgavāran’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
mn23:14.4: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (11)
mn23:15.1: ‘Kummo’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
mn23:15.4: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (12)
mn23:16.2: cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ piyarūpānaṃ kāmūpasaṃhitānaṃ rajanīyānaṃ, sotaviññeyyānaṃ saddānaṃ …
mn23:16.8: kāyaviññeyyānaṃ phoṭṭhabbānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ piyarūpānaṃ kāmūpasaṃhitānaṃ rajanīyānaṃ.
mn23:16.10: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (13)
mn23:17.3: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṃ ādāyāti ayametassa attho. (14)
mn23:18.3: namo karohi nāgassāti ayametassa attho”ti. (15)
mn23:19.2: Attamano āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
